name: Pirates With Laser Pistols
description:
Arrrrr, how yah be sea lover!?

Keep Captain Green Beards booty of gold safe from the monsters of the sea and

and this games jam scariest boss!

+if you enjoy this game and would like me to fix anything to add anything let me know!

controls--------------

+++all in game controls and mouse only+++

PRESS R to reset the level and to find a team that fit right for you!

your pirate crew is random and made up from members of the WV community.

PRESS C for the credits

PRESS `  to return back to the menu!

cards------

Place the red card over your crew to upgrade their pistols 

Place the Pink card over your crew to heal them for two HP

Place the orange card over your wooden squared to build a cannon 

Place the green card over your captain for a surprise attack

be carful of the grey shadow card! it wastes your money and makes your hp, coins and enemies invisible for a short amount of time 

The game was created by Whitevault

additional Crew were created by the WhiteVault Twitch community 

PLEASE READ THE CREDITS IN GAME!

This is my submission for the 4th Vaultacular Game Jam!
